name: It's Raining
description:
Excited for my first game jam! I have some issues in uploading my game to itch.io so the game only works when you click full screen.

In North Carolina we always have rain storms and loose electricity each time. I constantly find myself searching for things in the dark. From this situation, I got inspired to make this mystery/memory game.

It is not fully developed and it is the second game I made, so I would appreciate your feedback!
